  2. “Some of the biggest and most powerful companies are, without permission, using our work to train AI models...This assault on human creativity must be stopped”: Pearl Jam, The Cure, R.E.M. attack “predatory” use of AI in music  Louder
  3. Jon Bon Jovi, Billie Eilish and more sign open letter protesting 'predatory use of AI'  ABC News
  4. Sinatra sings Nirvana: Musicians like Billie Eilish speak out against AI  Fast Company
  5. Billie Eilish and Nicki Minaj want stop to 'predatory' music AI  BBC.com

item.title: Nvidia plans to build a $200 million AI center in Indonesia amid push into Southeast Asia - CNBC
item.description:
